author: Aham Bu ifesinachi
text: Youths will never learn and I still weep..One bastard masterminded the #ObigboMassacre and the other amongst the masterminds of the 5000 Massob massacres😭😭..I have never seen a failed and classless people like the Nigerian Youths..

author: Aham Bu ifesinachi
text: Yet,you still chant and praise them as if nothing happened..I saw My fellow youths defending the gory nature of this bastards all in the name of Loyalists,Tribes and Religions,Some have wished Tinubu President in 2023 and has defended every thing he does out of impunity.

author: Aham Bu ifesinachi
text: If The #EndSARS campaign didn't show you who this politicians are and how rotten their hearts can be,then you should beg for death because you are worse than them.This are the bastards that masterminded the killings in all the states and hoarded our palliatives.

author: Aham Bu ifesinachi
text: Nigerian Youths are just shameless and Jobless. We suddenly forgot what this wicked politicians did to us on the  #EndSARS campaign,The obigbo massacre and Toll gate killings ?
